lac.algorithms.mac

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • lac.algorithms.Rule
      • lac.algorithms.mac.Rule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Rule
extends Rule
    Class for representing a rule in MAC. It adds support for tidsets
